Miramax
Quentin Tarantino has reintroduced audiences to a lot of songs over the years: Nancy Sinatra's "Bang Bang" in Kill Bill, Dick Dale's "Misirlou" in Pulp Fiction, and Dave Dee, Dozy, Beaky, Mi… [+245 chars]
